metadata.title: Genuine Leather Flower Change Purse, Colorful Flowers Wallet, Joyful Design -1
features: Use the choice genuine, special-tanned cowhide.
Made by the special 3D leather produce techniques
100% Hand-Made by our master leather craftsmen.
A great ideal for a unique top grade gift for all seasons.
description: The Wristlet Wallet/Coin Purse use a Zipper closure. Beautiful Flowers Pattern is embossed on the both side, Red base with bright colorful and a full of joy design. The size is nicely to hold up to 20 credit cards. -- Measurements: 5.5" (L) X 3.0" (H) X1.5" (D) -- Wrist Leather Strap Drop down is 7.0" Approx.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "5.51 x 2.99 x 1.5 inches; 5.92 Ounces", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "January 6, 2012"}
